name: CSV File Ingestion
description: Ingest CSV files into Dagster assets with pandas DataFrames
author: Dagster Community

file_path.label: CSV File Path
file_path.description: Path to the CSV file to ingest

encoding.label: File Encoding
encoding.description: Character encoding of the CSV file

skip_rows.label: Skip Rows
skip_rows.description: Number of rows to skip at the start of the file

header_row.label: Header Row
header_row.description: Row number to use as column names (0-indexed, leave empty for no header)

columns_to_read.label: Columns to Read
columns_to_read.description: Comma-separated list of column names to read (leave empty for all columns)

dtype_mapping.label: Column Types (JSON)
dtype_mapping.description: JSON mapping of column names to data types

parse_dates.label: Date Columns
parse_dates.description: Comma-separated list of columns to parse as dates

cache_to_parquet.label: Cache to Parquet
cache_to_parquet.description: Cache the CSV data to a parquet file for better performance

parquet_path.label: Parquet Cache Path
parquet_path.description: Path where parquet cache will be stored (auto-generated if empty)

outputs.name: dataframe
outputs.description: The ingested CSV data as a pandas DataFrame
